title: Delhi government mulls proposal to transition Gramin Seva autos to electric vehicles
description: The Delhi government plans to rejuvenate the Gramin Seva autos by transitioning them to electric vehicles. This move aims to address the demands of the union representing these autos, which have seen a decline in numbers due to high operating costs and competition from e-rickshaws. The proposal is under active consideration by the Transport Department.
